text: [You go silent as you try to comprehend this…thing.]

[As it emerges from the water you notice the several heads protruding from the immense form before you. Each looks like it's reaching out to you, somehow pleading, enraged, and desperately afraid all at once.]

name: Eve
text: I-I’m really sorry! It’s just so dark down here I-I didn’t see you!
[It tilts its frontmost head to the side. It feels like you’re being examined.]
[Suddenly, a tentacle-like stream of the black goo comes towards your face. Some of the cold, wet substance flings onto your cheek.]
Look, I don’t want to fight. How about I just get a picture of you, and I get out of here?

name: Black Blob Monster
text: You face the coursing red river…to battle violence itself…
